name: The Game Of Life And Death (Mr. Newbe)
name_original: The Game Of Life And Death (Mr. Newbe)
description:
You play a necromancer who is able to revive his dead opponents and use them to fight your opponents to prevent yourself from recieving harm.

Known bugs: 

Health bar disappears after first boss fight. (will be fixed in update after jam)

Freezing movement.
